summary:
I am a recent MBA graduate with 10+ years of professional experience across various functional areas in multiple sectors such as public sector, oil & gas, healthcare manufacturing and retail. I offer a unique blend of strategic thinking, problem-solving, interpersonal, and analytical skills, underpinned by an engineering mindset.

Functional areas:
- Strategy development and implementation
- Sustainability
- Stakeholder management
- Regulatory affairs
- Policies, guidelines and frameworks
- Business development/ administration
- Project monitoring
- Digitalization
- Finance 
- Audit
- Team leadership
- Operations management
- Commercial due diligence
- Energy transition / Decarbonization
headline: MBA | Engineer | Strategy & Operations | Problem Solving | Leadership

experience.description:
The main goal was to develop a strategic plan for the measurement and reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from the company's supply chain.

Activities involved:
-	Analysing the case
-	Analyse the supply chain of the company
-	Identify different GHG measurement techniques and methodologies.
-	Develop GHG emissions measurement and reduction strategies.
-	Design a “centralized data management platform” for data collection.
-	Recommend the necessary steps to improve overall sustainability from the company’s operations, aiming to achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 as per the European Green Deal.
experience.title: Consultant (Sustainability Strategy)

experience.description: As a member of the sales team, I assisted customers with their purchases by providing great customer service and resolving purchase-related customer issues to enhance customer satisfaction.
experience.title: Sales Associate

experience.companyName: Directorate General of Hydrocarbons under MOPNG
experience.description:
DGH is a regulatory authority and a part of Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas of India. As a government officer, I worked on various country-level assignments and strategy-making practices for the continuous improvement of governmental administrative processes and to reduce India's hydrocarbon dependency on other countries.

Main responsibilities:
-	Monitoring and reviewing the performance of ONGC Ltd. as a nodal officer
-	Communicating with company executives, government agencies, research institutes, consulting firms, and cross-functional teams
-	Monitoring the progress of multimillion-dollar projects
-	Solving administrative issues faced by the company
-	Identifying areas for improvement in regulatory practices
-	Developing strategies for the government to boost domestic hydrocarbon production
-	Reviewing field development plans and investment proposals
-	Ensuring compliance with government policies and regulations
-	Witnessing field operations
-	Formulating policies, guidelines and frameworks
-	Engaging stakeholders in CO2 emission reduction initiatives
-	Reviewing work programs, budgets, and audit reports
-	Implementing digitalization practices along with the IT team
-	Conducting company performance review meetings
-	Replying to Parliament queries
experience.title: Senior Consultant

experience.description:
As a reservoir engineer in the Exploration and Production division of GSPC Ltd., I oversaw various offshore and onshore blocks and implemented efficient reservoir management practices to maintain and improve the performance and productivity of the field.
 
Main responsibilities:
-	Finding the location of oil and gas beneath the earth's surface
-	Developing data-driven reservoir simulation models and profitable development strategies
-	Performing financial analysis to check the commerciality of the project
-	Presenting development plans to the government authority
-	Planning and supervising field reservoir operations
-	Executing workover jobs with revival strategies for sick wells
-	Optimizing production in the fields
-	Conducting reservoir studies to diagnose and troubleshoot production issues
-	Collecting operational data and analyzing the data for better understanding of the sub-surface and enabling accurate future production strategies
-	Streamlining and migrating reservoir data for effective data management
-	Preparing detailed work programs and budgets (AFEs)
-	Estimating the commercial potential of the company’s assets
experience.title: Strategy & Operations Lead (Reservoir Engineering)

experience.description: During an internship, I learned Material balance for gas condensate reservoirs and reservoir drive mechanisms for the reserves estimation and reservoir production performance analysis.
experience.title: summer internship

member.occupation: MBA | Engineer | Strategy & Operations | Problem Solving | Leadership

projects.description:
Financial Management and Accounting: Performed financial analysis of Loreal Group and Estee Lauder companies and recommended measures for further improvement.

Economics: Investigated the critical issue of overfishing in the European Union, offering insights and recommendations to address this economical challenge.

Fintech: Analyzed the fintech industry, with a focus on success stories like Bunq in the neo-banking segment and Esty in e-commerce. Analyzed the fintech landscape with the introduction of mobile wallets with e-commerce by Esty Company.

Digital Transformation: Recommended action plan for digital transformation initiatives to enhance business operations and efficiency within the organization.

Big Data and Data Analytics: Analyzed the effectiveness of a virtual try-on experience using big data and analytics, enhancing the customer experience at Inditex Group.
 
Supply Chain Analysis: Analyzed the supply chain processes of the company, identifying critical issues such as poor data management systems and gaps in inventory data, and developed a strategic action plan to address these issues, resulting in enhanced supply chain efficiency.

Industry 4.0: Performed a comprehensive study on the development of fully automated offshore rigs using Industry 4.0 technology.
projects.title: Case studies / Projects

member.occupation: MBA | Engineer | Strategy & Operations | Problem Solving | Leadership

projects.description:
Corporate and Business Strategy: Developed a comprehensive corporate and business strategy to navigate Coffee Day company out of a financial crisis, resulting in significant financial improvement and stability.
 
Market Research and Product Development: Performed a customer satisfaction study using data analytics to identify the significance of various attributes on overall customer satisfaction for the "Coffee 09" brand, enabling data-driven, profitable strategies.

Marketing Strategy: Developed marketing strategies and Go-To-Market (GTM) plans to facilitate market expansion for products within the Arion Group portfolio.

Digital Commerce and Marketing: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of digital commerce and marketing strategies, offering recommendations to enhance Carrefour's market presence.

Leadership and Organizational Culture: Applied leadership approaches to foster diversity and cultivate a positive mindset within organizations, addressing organizational culture concerns.
 
Change Management: Conducted an in-depth analysis of organizational work culture issues within a government organization, focusing on organizational culture, mindset, and leadership, addressing concerns, and recommending improvements.

Corporate Responsibility and Ethics: Analyzed corporate responsibility and ethics within Inditex Group, identifying areas for enhancement and proposing actionable recommendations.
projects.title: Case studies/Projects
